reviews.review_msg: Dr. Mladenovic is a sweet, kind and caring professor, She takes the time to get to know her students and actually cares about you. While her class is hard with lots of memorization, this is to be expected with any bio class. She brings treats to class occasionally and is very sweet and supportive of whatever questions you have.

I had Dr M for both Bisc 101 and Bisc 102 in first year. Hands down, the most sincere prof there is, she genuinely wants her students to succeed and will help in any way she can to ensure so! Yes, exams can be challenging, but they're based off the lecture slides and handouts, so make sure you study those. This class taught me how to study lol

Had Ivona for both Bisc 101 and 102. She is one of the most caring profs I've had. To do well, you need to put in work but study straight from her slides, no textbook needed. Exams are very detailed and quite long but are manageable as long as you know her lecture slides. Ask questions in labs/office hours, study for quizzes and you should be good.

Ivona is a great prof and provides great feedback to you. Both, Bisc 101/102 are difficult courses, thus, preparing before the lecture and well before exams and quizzes will help you get a good mark. She is super helpful in explaining the topics in both lab and lecture. Be sure to keep up with the class average though! These classes are curved!

Wouldnt recommend this prof to anyone but if youre a Bio student you just have to deal with her I guess. The prof acts nice but from the inside she doesnt care about her students at all. Her exams are badly written and she doesnt even do anything herself the TAs do everything.

Ivona is one of the sweetest professors I've ever had. She really cares about the well-being of her students and is very passionate about her subject. However, she and her TAs are hard markers, so you'll probably lose a lot of marks for small things. The labs are usually pretty long and boring, but the topics covered in the course are interesting.

I took both bisc 101 and 102 and I found 102 to be more fun. Basic stuff about evolution. I would recommend you take this class with ARCH 131, as they both go together very nicely. Be prepared to study for the lab exams, as you need to pass them to pass the course. Just make sure you answer all the questions in  the lab manual and you should be fin
He's very confusing a lot of times. I wished I had a different prof.
Very helpful, very approachable and always made class interesting
